remarks: ~ luk-3 derived from Russell-Bernays'. This theorem, along with ~ re1axmp , ~ re2luk1 , and ~ re2luk2 shows that ~ rb-ax1 , ~ rb-ax2 , ~ rb-ax3 , and ~ rb-ax4 , along with ~ anmp , can be used as a complete axiomatization of propositional calculus.  (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 19-Aug-2011.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
